channel.title: Help with getting people to connect to my 317
channel.description:
okay well i got my server, i port forwarded right, then i have my no-ip duc on with my no-ip.
Then i went into my client folder, went into gui.java and went ctrl+f typed in 127.0.0.1 changed both the ips to my no ip I can connect then i got my friend to download my client, just the client folder and he tried to connect and could could u please help me?

item.title: Help with getting people to connect to my 317
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Your router may have a firewall setting too, if so you will need to allow port 43594 through the routers firewall.

Read full topic
